info.author: Kevin Dangoor
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
TestGears provides automatic discovery of unittest.TestCases and the
ability to run tests that are written as simple functions. It
generates a standard unittest.TestSuite for use with any of the
standard frontends, and provides a distutils command to run tests
with zero configuration.
info.name: TestGears
info.html_description: TestGears provides automatic discovery of unittest.TestCases and the ability to run tests that are written as simple functions. It generates a standard unittest.TestSuite for use with any of the standard frontends, and provides a distutils command to run tests with zero configuration.
